Woman confronts rapist, Ericson Pascua, saying he ‘ruined her life’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-confronts-rapist-ericson-pascua-saying-he-he-he-he-her-her-her-her-life/u3kebvgg3lfdhfolgiv6fbqm43m/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-confronts-rapist-ericson-pascua-saying-he-he-he-he-her-her-her-her-life/u3kebvgg3lfdhfolgiv6fbqm43m/ Belinda Feek“I have felt the effects of this in every aspect of my life," she told Ericson Pascua.
